Got it On this screen, you can search for a food, to view food calories, click on the title. You can also view a list of previously saved food list by pressing \'Favourites\' button.
You can view energy and other detail of food on this screen. You can add the current item into favourite list, by pressing \'Add to Favourites\' button. You can remove the current item from favourite list, by pressing \'Remove from Favourites\' button.
Ingredient details screen From the list of ingredients, you will be redirected here. On this screen you can see the nutrition of an ingredient. CBC News Reader

OK Click on the \'News feed\' button to fetch and view latest news titles. Click on a title to read article.\n Click on the \'Favourites\' button to view saved articles. Click on the \'View in browser\' button to read full article online.\n Click on \'Save article\' to save the current news article to view article later on.\n Click on \'Remove article\' to remove the current news article. Click on the \'Search\' button to get search for a movie. Click on the movie title to get more information. Click on the \'Favourites\' button to view saved movies.
You can view all the information about a movie, to save movie information offline click on \'Add to favourites\'. To remove the movie information offline, click on \'Remove from favourites\'.
Add movies into favourites to view statistics!
